name: Start a Discussion
description: Open a topic for discussion or request community input
title: Discussion: <Topic here>

field_guidance.background:
Include:
- Why this discussion is needed
- Current situation or problem
- Any relevant history or previous discussions
field_guidance.main_points: Use bullet points or numbered lists for clarity.
field_guidance.stakeholders: You can @mention specific people or teams, or describe groups that should provide input.
field_guidance.desired_outcome:
Examples:
- Consensus on approach
- List of requirements
- Decision on policy
- Community feedback
